findings.title: Incompatible declarations for external linkage function deflate
findings.description: The declaration and implementation of the deflate function use incompatible types.

findings.title: Finding 2: Accessing a buffer of char via a pointer to unsigned int
findings.description: In crc32_little and crc32_big functions, a pointer to unsigned int is used to access a buffer of type char*.

findings.title: Finding 3: Out-Of-Bounds Pointer Arithmetic In Inftrees.c
findings.description: Zlib computes out-of-bounds pointers in several places, even though these pointers are not dereferenced.

findings.title: Finding 4: Undefined Left Shift of Negative Number
findings.description: Invalid left shift of a negative number in inflate.c at line 1507.

findings.title: Finding 5: Big Endian Out Of Bounds Pointer
